system.description:
A super Stimpak is an enhanced version of the standard Stimpak, with an additional vial of medicine and a leather strap to secure the needle to the patient’s arm during treatment. A more potent cocktail of medication is used in a super Stimpak, allowing it to heal much more effectively.

  • Use: A super Stimpak can be used in one of two ways: it can be applied using the Take Chem minor action, healing 8 HP or treating up to two Injuries immediately, or it can be applied as part of a First Aid action, healing 8 HP or treating up to two Injuries in addition to any other healing done.
